message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.HC 

This paper is about building an open-domain conversational agent, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The paper proposes a novel method for evaluating the quality of dialog models using interactive human evaluation and self-play scenarios. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which focuses on NLP and its intersection with computer science. 

The paper also introduces improvements to recent hierarchical dialog generation architectures through sentiment and semantic knowledge distillation on the utterance level, which falls under the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

The paper evaluates the proposed method using various metrics and experiments, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). 

The paper also discusses the importance of interactive evaluation and the need for a better evaluation method, which falls under the sub-category of cs.SD (Software Engineering). 

Finally, the paper opensources the interactive evaluation platform and dataset, which falls under the sub-category of cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
